note.p: Birth: The parish of St Andrew's, Holborn, London, England (23 August 1687)
References: Geoffrey Cantor, 'Quakers in the Royal Society, 1660-1750' in NR 1997 vol 51 pp 175-193

Notes: Proposed by Sir Hans Sloane. Withdrawn 12 Apr 1752 (Thomson's History of the Royal Society, but not noted in Council Minutes). DNB says he was dead in 1750 when his book 'A delineation of universal law' was first published, but that he resigned from the RS in 1752
